data.text:
(It all happened……back when I was little. It was when I was 
injured after a foot race)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(It all happened……back when I was little. It was when I was 
<story>injured after a foot race)

data.text:
(『Rest for now, don't move』 is what I was told, and I stayed in 
bed for a long time. One time while I was sleeping―)
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>(『Rest for now, don't move』 is what I was told, and I stayed in 
<story>bed for a long time. One time while I was sleeping―)

data.text:
Where……is this? I'm in the water……I was swimming in the river……I 
wonder if I'm drowning.
data.name: Young Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Where……is this? I'm in the water……I was swimming in the river……I 
<story>wonder if I'm drowning.

data.text:
Am I going to drown just like this!? Unable to float, just like 
this in the river……!
data.name: Young Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Am I going to drown just like this!? Unable to float, just like 
<story>this in the river……!

data.text: Rickey. Oh, Rickey.
data.processed: <story>Rickey. Oh, Rickey.

data.text: Eh, who are you……!?
data.name: Young Rickey
data.processed: <story>Eh, who are you……!?

data.text:
Do not fear being Unlucky, rather, 
learn the ways of becoming Lucky.
data.processed:
<story>Do not fear being Unlucky, rather, 
<story>learn the ways of becoming Lucky.

data.text: Understood? Learn to become Lucky.
data.processed: <story>Understood? Learn to become Lucky.

data.text: Dragon God……sama
data.name: Young Rickey
data.processed: <story>Dragon God……sama

data.text:
That's right, that was the day I learned about Feng Shui, 
and became enamored with it. And now―!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>That's right, that was the day I learned about Feng Shui, 
<story>and became enamored with it. And now―!

data.text: Fool! Rejected, it's rejected!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Fool! Rejected, it's rejected!

data.text:
Don't say that and just think about it, Air Groove-san! 
For us Uma Musume to all become strong and happy, we definitely―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Don't say that and just think about it, Air Groove-san! 
<story>For us Uma Musume to all become strong and happy, we definitely―

data.text:
Need to add Feng Shui to the curriculum! 
Rickey☆ Lucky☆ and we're all Happy!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Need to add Feng Shui to the curriculum! 
<story>Rickey☆ Lucky☆ and we're all Happy!

data.text:
There's no need. What we need is studying and training, 
not something occult. Now leave!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>There's no need. What we need is studying and training, 
<story>not something occult. Now leave!

data.text:
Ehhh!? Wait! Why won't she try to understand? 
Feng Shui isn't occult! It's not suspicious at all!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ehhh!? Wait! Why won't she try to understand? 
<story>Feng Shui isn't occult! It's not suspicious at all!

data.text:
While walking in the hallway……I came across a strange scene. An 
Uma Musume being chased out of the student council's office for 
pushing Feng Shui too passionately……
data.processed:
<story>While walking in the hallway……I came across a strange scene. An 
<story>Uma Musume being chased out of the student council's office for 
<story>pushing Feng Shui too passionately……

data.text:
Ah, you over there. 
You're a trainer……right?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ah, you over there. 
<story>You're a trainer……right?

data.text:
How about it? How about trying out "Feng Shui" with me? 
You're interested right, right? Right?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>How about it? How about trying out "Feng Shui" with me? 
<story>You're interested right, right? Right?

data.text:
Nope, you're definitely not Lucky enough☆ Now, come, come with 
me. Starting from the basics, I'll teach you properly.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Nope, you're definitely not Lucky enough☆ Now, come, come with 
<story>me. Starting from the basics, I'll teach you properly.

data.text: And just like that, I was pulled along against my will―
data.processed: <story>And just like that, I was pulled along against my will―

data.text:
See, you hear all the time about how someone's 『Fortunate』 or 
『Unfortunate』 right? When something bad happens, sometimes 
they'll blame it on luck.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>See, you hear all the time about how someone's 『Fortunate』 or 
<story>『Unfortunate』 right? When something bad happens, sometimes 
<story>they'll blame it on luck.

data.text:
But you see, that's not really about bad luck. It's more about 
understanding and dealing with the fortunes associated with the 
azimuth and the conflict between the five elements. For example―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>But you see, that's not really about bad luck. It's more about 
<story>understanding and dealing with the fortunes associated with the 
<story>azimuth and the conflict between the five elements. For example―

data.text:
When you rearrange your room, it feels like the atmosphere has 
cleared up, right? The reason for that is, because when the 
furniture has been rearranged―
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>When you rearrange your room, it feels like the atmosphere has 
<story>cleared up, right? The reason for that is, because when the 
<story>furniture has been rearranged―

data.text:
That sense of pressure when you're sleeping, the 『Horizontal 
Pressure』, and the perceived 『Lack of Wealth』 are alleviated. 
Even if it's unconsciously, see!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>That sense of pressure when you're sleeping, the 『Horizontal 
<story>Pressure』, and the perceived 『Lack of Wealth』 are alleviated. 
<story>Even if it's unconsciously, see!?

data.text:
How was it? Amazing right? After listening to me you 
want to learn more! You want to expand your horizons, right?
data.name: Copano Rickey

choices.text: No, I don't particularly feel that way……
choices.processed: <size=41>No, I don't particularly feel that way……</size>

choices.text: No, I don't particularly feel that way……
choices.processed: <size=41>No, I don't particularly feel that way……</size>

data.processed:
<story>How was it? Amazing right? After listening to me you 
<story>want to learn more! You want to expand your horizons, right?

data.text: Eeh, even after I explained it in so much detail!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Eeh, even after I explained it in so much detail!?

data.text:
Hmmmm, was it still hard to understand……? 
How can I express the splendor of Feng Shui even more simply……?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Hmmmm, was it still hard to understand……? 
<story>How can I express the splendor of Feng Shui even more simply……?

data.text:
……it's not that her explanation was bad. It's just, no matter how 
I thought about it, it didn't feel like something I should 
frivolously believe in.

choices.text: I'm heading off. Do your best out there
choices.processed: <size=42>I'm heading off. Do your best out there</size>

choices.text: I'm heading off. Do your best out there
choices.processed: <size=42>I'm heading off. Do your best out there</size>

data.processed:
<story>……it's not that her explanation was bad. It's just, no matter how 
<story>I thought about it, it didn't feel like something I should 
<story>frivolously believe in.

data.text:
Ah, wait. 
Where are you going?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Ah, wait. 
<story>Where are you going?

data.text:
It seemed like it was better not to get involved. 
While thinking that and trying to leave―
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like it was better not to get involved. 
<story>While thinking that and trying to leave―

data.text: Tomorrow's Selection Race!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Tomorrow's Selection Race!

data.text:
Make sure to watch tomorrow's Selection Race! I'll show you Feng 
Shui's power there! At this point, all that's left is to prove it!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Make sure to watch tomorrow's Selection Race! I'll show you Feng 
<story>Shui's power there! At this point, all that's left is to prove it!

data.text:
That Uma Musume, "Copano Rickey". I pretended not to see that she 
was waving her hands with all she had.
data.processed:
<story>That Uma Musume, "Copano Rickey". I pretended not to see that she 
<story>was waving her hands with all she had.

data.text: -And then, the next day.
data.processed: <story>-And then, the next day.

data.text:
Aha, I knew you'd come and take a look! You pretended 
not to be interested but, really, you were super 
interested in Feng Shui, right?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Aha, I knew you'd come and take a look! You pretended 
<story>not to be interested but, really, you were super 
<story>interested in Feng Shui, right?

data.text:
Regardless of whether or not Copano Rickey was participating in 
the Selection Race, it was an important event. There were a lot 
of other Uma Musume I wanted to get a look at too.
data.processed:
<story>Regardless of whether or not Copano Rickey was participating in 
<story>the Selection Race, it was an important event. There were a lot 
<story>of other Uma Musume I wanted to get a look at too.

data.text:
The race I'm entering in is a little later. How about making 
yourself comfortable and getting some warm oolong tea in 
preparation for that?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>The race I'm entering in is a little later. How about making 
<story>yourself comfortable and getting some warm oolong tea in 
<story>preparation for that?

data.text:
Once you see my Feng Shui based running, it'll set your heart a 
flutter! Don't blame me for what happens after that☆
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Once you see my Feng Shui based running, it'll set your heart a 
<story>flutter! Don't blame me for what happens after that☆

data.text:
Setting aside whether I believe in Feng Shui or not, Copano 
Rickey was the type of Uma Musume to get immersed and high 
tension when talking about her beloved Feng Shui.
data.processed:
<story>Setting aside whether I believe in Feng Shui or not, Copano 
<story>Rickey was the type of Uma Musume to get immersed and high 
<story>tension when talking about her beloved Feng Shui.

data.text:
I don't really understand Feng Shui, but when she's this 
energetic, she might leave surprisingly good results. It was 
pleasant watching over her―
data.processed:
<story>I don't really understand Feng Shui, but when she's this 
<story>energetic, she might leave surprisingly good results. It was 
<story>pleasant watching over her―

data.text:
Eh, wait a minute……! 
The energies around the training ground……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Eh, wait a minute……! 
<story>The energies around the training ground……

data.text:
The atmosphere feels a little strange…… 
Perhaps……the flow of qi has changed?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>The atmosphere feels a little strange…… 
<story>Perhaps……the flow of qi has changed?

data.text:
Is that which is stirring, something visible to 
the eye in the realm of the physical? Or is it……something 
invisible to the eye in the spiritual?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>Is that which is stirring, something visible to 
<story>the eye in the realm of the physical? Or is it……something 
<story>invisible to the eye in the spiritual?

data.text:
In any case! In the next race, it seems like something might 
happen. If left alone it could be something awful.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>In any case! In the next race, it seems like something might 
<story>happen. If left alone it could be something awful.

data.text:
No, I'm not imagining it! Something about the 
participants' condition seems a little off too……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
<story>No, I'm not imagining it! Something about the 
<story>participants' condition seems a little off too……

data.text: Where is the cause!? Just what could be causing it……?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: <story>Where is the cause!? Just what could be causing it……?

data.text:
Suddenly her expression seemed cloudy. The look 
on her face was so serious that……it was difficult 
to laugh this off as just the occult.
data.processed:
<story>Suddenly her expression seemed cloudy. The look 
<story>on her face was so serious that……it was difficult 
<story>to laugh this off as just the occult.
